knimeNode.name: Term to Structure
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts terms to molecule structures represented as strings and adds a new column containing them.

fullDescription.intro: Converts the terms of the specified term column to molecule strings formatted by a specified format using the OSCAR framework (see https://bitbucket.org/wwmm/oscar4/overview for details). Based on OSCAR version 4.1.1 using OPSIN 1.3, molecules are translates into e.g. SMILES strings. If a term can not be translated a missing cell is returned.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the terms to convert into molecules descriptions.

ports.inPort: An input data table containing term cells.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the input data with an additional string cell column.
